resources.string: Please take the evening saliva sample!
Please take evening saliva sample now!
The saliva sample alarms were scheduled.
Please enter the Participant ID you received from us.
Are you sure to kill all alarms and saliva timers? This action cannot be undone!
Please disable battery optimization for CARWatch to ensure that the alarms will be triggered reliably.
The icon of the CARWatch app
To enable all of the features, our app requires following permissions:
Camera access to be able to scan the sample tube barcodes
Sending notifications to inform you about upcoming samples

You only need to report your awakening if you didn\'t set an alarm for the morning or woke up before the alarm went off. Clicking the \"Yes\" Button will schedule the sample alarms for the upcoming day.
You can set an alarm for the next morning directly from the alarm clock screen. Simply tap on the displayed time and choose your desired wake-up time.
After you woke up, the screen also provides an overview of past and upcoming saliva alarms and their current state.

The symbols next to the alarm time show whether a sample has been taken (checkmark), was already due (clock) or is scheduled for later (hourglass). Pressing the scanner icon opens the barcode scanner for the respective sample.

Here, you can initiate the evening procedure before going to bed. You only need to do this if the study requires you to take an evening sample. The \"Lights out!\" Button will activate the app\'s dark mode.
The barcode scanner opens automatically when you have to take a sample. After sampling, simply scan the barcode on the sample tube so that the sample can later be linked to the time of sampling.

The app is now ready to go. To start the study, set the alarm for the next day or report your awakening in the morning. If you need to re-configure the app or you want to do the tutorial again, press the respective entries in the top-right menu.
Please point your camera at a barcode
Invalid Barcode! Please scan the correct barcode label on the saliva tube.
Please don\'t forget to turn off all regular alarms in your default alarm app!
Please remember to fill out the sleep and saliva protocols in the meanwhile!

Are all sensors in place?

If you use the sensor armband: Please remember to wear the sensor throughout your time in bed on your non-dominant hand!

If you use the ECG chest strap: Please make sure that it fits correctly and you moistened the electrodes before wearing.

If you use the Sleep analyzer mat: Please make sure it is plugged in, has power supply and is correctly placed under the bed sheets.
We will now begin with collecting the morning saliva samples.
Good Morning!\nDid you just wake up?
We will now begin with the evening procedure.
Good Evening!\nAre you going to bed?
"Please set your desired\n alarm time for tomorrow. "
This alarm is required for the study. Are you sure to cancel this alarm?
This sample is scheduled for later. Are you sure you want to scan the sample now?
You have already taken all morning saliva samples!
You have already taken the evening saliva sample
You have already finished the study.
Please take your evening saliva sample first!\nStart the procedure by pressing the \'Yes\' Button.
%1$d more clicks to kill all alarms.
Invalid QR Code! Please scan the QR Code in your study materials.
This barcode was already scanned before. Please check and make sure to use a new salivette.
